T02D2980:51a-0: @51a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2980:51a-1: gdon thams cad las thar bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa
T02D2980:51a-2: pos gdon gang gis zin pa'i mtshan ma rnams shes
T02D2980:51a-3: par bya ste / lha'i gdon gyis 'gro ba mi rigs bzhi ka la 'jug ste /
T02D2980:51a-4: lhag par gtsang spra bya ba'am tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i mi la 'jug ste /
T02D2980:51b-0: snying mi dga' zhing @51b zas mi len smra snying
T02D2980:51b-1: mi 'dod gnyid mi phebs phyi sa che chung 'gag
T02D2980:51b-3: gdong padma ltar gyur pa ni lha'i gdon gyis zin pa'o //
T02D2980:51b-4: de las thar bar 'dod pa me tog phreng ba dkar po la sogs pa dang /
T02D2980:51b-5: gtor ma dkar po byin te /
T02D2980:51b-6: lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am lha'i gnas su sbyin no //
T02D2980:51b-7: de nas shing ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dang rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dang /
T02D2980:51b-8: shun lpags dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2980:51b-9: shu dag dkar po yungs kar rnams zhib par btags te /
T02D2980:51b-10: me chung bas mar phul bzhi'i nang du btsos la de la dmigs nas /
T02D2980:51b-11: bsku ba dang snar blugs pa dang /
T02D2980:51b-12: ltor gtang ba ste snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos
T02D2980:51b-13: pa bzlas la khrus byas te nad pa la blud
T02D2980:51b-14: na lha'i gdon las thar bar nges so //
